Showcase of bundled themes in **rstudiothemes**.

You can installed them with:

```{r}
#| label: demo
#| eval: false

rstudiothemes::install_rstudiothemes()
```

We also distribute all our themes in a single `.zip` file
[dist/rstudiothemes.zip](https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/dist/rstudiothemes.zip).
Unzip and install using the [RStudio IDE
interface](https://docs.posit.co/ide/user/ide/guide/ui/appearance.html).

**Tools \> Global Options \> Appearance \> Add**

![](rstudiogui.png){alt="RStudio IDE, Add-Theme UI" width="80%"}

## Gallery

Gallery created with [Lightbox for Bootstrap
5](https://trvswgnr.github.io/bs5-lightbox/). Click the images to enlarge.

<!--- Work with pkgdown --->

```{r}
#| label: style
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

cat("<style>
.lightbox-caption em{
  font-style: normal;
  font-size: 300%;
  font-weight: 800;
  font-family: 'Inter Tight';
  text-shadow: 0 0 10px black;
  color: white;
}
.lightbox-caption {
  position: absolute !important;
  top: 20%;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1;
  opacity:0.35;
}
.like_h {
  text-shadow: 0 0 8px black;
  opacity: 0.7;
  color: white;
}
</style>
")


```

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false

library(rstudiothemes)

themes <- list_rstudiothemes(list_installed = FALSE)

png_name <- paste0(gsub(" ", "", tolower(themes)))

pths <- file.path("screenshots", paste0(png_name, ".png"))

th_url <- file.path(
  "https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/articles/",
  pths
)
```

::: {.row .row-cols-1 .row-cols-md-2 .g-1}
```{r}
#| label: card_layout
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

for (i in seq_along(themes)) {
  cat("<div class=\"col\">")
  cat("<div class=\"card bg-dark text-white\">")
  cat(c(paste0(
    "<img src=\"", pths[i], "\" class=\"card-img\" alt=\"\">"
  )), sep = "\n")

  cat(
    paste0(
      "<div class=\"card-img-overlay\" data-toggle=\"lightbox\" ",
      "data-gallery=\"rstudiothemes\" data-src=\"",
      th_url[i], "\" data-caption=\"", themes[i], "\" >"
    )
  )
  cat(c(paste0("<h5 class=\"like_h\">", themes[i], "</h5>")))
  cat("</div>")
  cat("</div>")
  cat("</div>")
}
```
:::

#| label: script
